name: Project Circle
description:
This is an action fighting game in which one character explores the map. There are many enemies in the map and you need to defeat them.
This is an RPG action game with a medieval background. Players can play their favorite characters, explore and travel in the open world map, and write their own stories.

Game Features:
⚪ Free scenario, friendly controller.
⚪ Good strike, accurate decision
⚪A large number of weapons, skills and action systems, enjoy the fun of action game
